alert.note: Alert for Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Otsego; Southern Oneida (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 16 at 5:28PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A line of heavy rain and gusty winds will impact portions of southeastern Oneida, western Otsego, southeastern Broome, Madison, northwestern Delaware and Chenango Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 526 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy rain and gusty winds along a line extending from near Sullivan to near Oxford to near Great Bend. Movement was east-northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Oneonta, Oneida, Norwich, Eaton, Chittenango, Paris, Hamilton, Sidney, Walton and Guilford. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 86/Route 17 between 78 and 84. Interstate 88 between 4 and 15. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Broome; Chenango; Delaware; Madison; Otsego; Southern Oneida
